Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack 2014 (x86 and x64) - DVD (Chinese-Simplified)
Files.Notes:
MDOP 2014 contains App-V 5.0 SP2, MBAM 2.5, UE-V 2.0, APGM 4.0 SP2, DaRT 8.1, and MED-V 2.0. New to MDOP 2014 is Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring tool (MBAM) 2.5. With this version, MBAM offers a series of improvements that will give businesses better control and help them achieve the highest level of compliance. It includes:
  • Enhanced support for FIPS 140-2.
  • Improved compliance and enforcement policies.
  • Support for enterprise scenarios and topologies.
For more information, please see the Windows Blog and the Springboard Series Blog.

Files.Description: Web Tools Extensions for Visual Studio 2012 (x86 and x64) - (Multiple Languages)
Files.Notes:
To manually install Windows Azure SDK 2.3, follow these steps:
  1. Install Visual Studio 2012 or Visual Studio 2013; or install Visual Web Developer 2012 or Visual Web Developer 2013.
  2. Install Local DB prereq of .Net FX Update 4.0.2 or higher from here.
  3. Install Windows Azure Authoring Tools (x64) or Windows Azure Authoring Tools (x86).
  4. Install Windows Azure Emulator (x64) or Windows Azure Emulator (x86).
  5. Install Windows Azure Client Libraries for .NET (x64) or Windows Azure Client Libraries for .NET (x86).
  6. Install Windows Azure Storage Emulator (x86 and x64).
  7. Install Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2012 (x86 and x64) or Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2013 (x86 and x64).
  8. Install Windows Azure LightSwitch Tools for Visual Studio 2013 (x86 and x64).
  9. Install Web Tools Extensions for Visual Studio 2012 (x86 and x64) or Web Tools Extensions for Visual Studio 2013 (x86 and x64); or install Web Tools Extensions for Visual Web Developer 2012 (x86 and x64) or Web Tools Extensions for Visual Web Developer 2013 (x86 and x64).

To manually install Windows Azure SDK 2.3, follow these steps:
  1. Install Visual Studio 2012 or Visual Studio 2013; or install Visual Web Developer 2012 or Visual Web Developer 2013.
  2. Install Local DB prereq of .Net FX Update 4.0.2 or higher from here.
  3. Install Windows Azure Authoring Tools (x64) or Windows Azure Authoring Tools (x86).
  4. Install Windows Azure Emulator (x64) or Windows Azure Emulator (x86).
  5. Install Windows Azure Client Libraries for .NET (x64) or Windows Azure Client Libraries for .NET (x86).
  6. Install Windows Azure Storage Emulator (x86 and x64).
  7. Install Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2012 (x86 and x64) or Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2013 (x86 and x64).
  8. Install Windows Azure LightSwitch Tools for Visual Studio 2013 (x86 and x64).
  9. Install Web Tools Extensions for Visual Studio 2012 (x86 and x64) or Web Tools Extensions for Visual Studio 2013 (x86 and x64); or install Web Tools Extensions for Visual Web Developer 2012 (x86 and x64) or Web Tools Extensions for Visual Web Developer 2013 (x86 and x64).

To manually install Windows Azure SDK 2.3, follow these steps:
  1. Install Visual Studio 2012 or Visual Studio 2013; or install Visual Web Developer 2012 or Visual Web Developer 2013.
  2. Install Local DB prereq of .Net FX Update 4.0.2 or higher from here.
  3. Install Windows Azure Authoring Tools (x64) or Windows Azure Authoring Tools (x86).
  4. Install Windows Azure Emulator (x64) or Windows Azure Emulator (x86).
  5. Install Windows Azure Client Libraries for .NET (x64) or Windows Azure Client Libraries for .NET (x86).
  6. Install Windows Azure Storage Emulator (x86 and x64).
  7. Install Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2012 (x86 and x64) or Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2013 (x86 and x64).
  8. Install Windows Azure LightSwitch Tools for Visual Studio 2013 (x86 and x64).
  9. Install Web Tools Extensions for Visual Studio 2012 (x86 and x64) or Web Tools Extensions for Visual Studio 2013 (x86 and x64); or install Web Tools Extensions for Visual Web Developer 2012 (x86 and x64) or Web Tools Extensions for Visual Web Developer 2013 (x86 and x64).

Files.Notes: This update is the latest in a cumulative series of releases that contain feature additions and bug fixes for Visual Studio 2013. It includes tools for Windows Phone 8.1 development. By releasing periodic updates, we can enhance and expand Visual Studio to support the latest software development innovations for building and managing modern apps. For more information, see Visual Studio Updates and the Visual Studio Update KB Article.
